revised_title: Numerical Analysis of Hyperbolic Partial Differential Equations: A Review of Methods and Techniques
tldr: This article discusses various methods for numerically analyzing hyperbolic partial differential equations, including the characteristic, mesh finite-difference, and particle-in-cell techniques. It highlights the development of a practical characteristic code for problems with many discontinuities and the incorporation of particle-in-cell features into Eulerian mesh methods. The article also reviews the use of artificial viscosity terms and the advantages and limitations of different methods in one and multiple dimensions.
